item.title: FeathersJS Refresh Token Implementation
item.description: FeathersJS provides authentication mechanism out of the box. But, it does not provide support for a refresh token. In this article we will see how we can implement refresh token feature to our system.

item.title: Create a custom route in FeathersJS without creating new service
item.description: Create a custom route in FeathersJS without creating a new service. A short video of the whole process is given as well.
